DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness high-intensity proactive service low-intensity reactive service Swedish National Tobacco Quitline ( SNTQ ) . Our hypothesis effectiveness 5 % high proactive reactive service . The structured treatment protocol mixture motivational interviewing ( MI ) , cognitive behavior therapy , pharmacological consultation.The standard process SNTQ offer client choice callback ( proactive service ) callback ( reactive service ) . In present study client offer choice , randomize proactive service even date reactive service odd date . Data collect postal questionnaire , one baseline one follow-up 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Tobacco user call SNTQ discus his/her tobacco behaviour . The client give verbal consent sign cessation support . The client return registration form include baseline questionnaire Snuff cessation
